block.schematicenergistics.cannon_interf: Allows the Schematic Cannon to interface with Applied Energistics 2 storage and autocraft.
creativetab.schematicenergistics.title: Schematic Energistics
gui.schematicenergistics.cannon_interfac: Disables auto crafting for this item. This will not stop the cannon from requesting items, but it will not attempt to craft them if they are not available.
Enables auto crafting for this item. The cannon will attempt to craft items if they are not available in the system.
Enables auto crafting of gunpowder for the cannon. This will allow the cannon to automatically craft gunpowder if it is not available in the system.
Disables auto crafting of gunpowder for the cannon. The cannon will not attempt to craft gunpowder if it is not available in the system.
Disables the cannon from requesting gunpowder. This will also stop the cannon from crafting gunpowder.
Enables the cannon to request gunpowder. Crafting is toggled separately.
Starts or resumes the Schematic Cannon.
